name: Onlink
short_description:
here you will find some handy Patches for the Uplink game.
the name "onlink" is the name of the old fan develop team, that created some fixes and patchs for the game.

Uplink is a trademark of Introversion Software
http://www.introversion.co.uk/
all right reserved to introversion software.

using this patches is only for users who boght the full game.
